column2: ENGLISH
They declined our gift!

The [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] for [Root.GetBaseName] against [New.GetTitledName] has resulted in [New.GetTitledName] converting, and becoming a faithful [From.Religion.GetGroupName]. [From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] will surely be pleased!
I was remiss not to invite you in the first place. You may indeed join my plot to [From.GetPlot].
Why would I want the help of the likes of you with my plot to [From.GetPlot]?
I accept your gracious offer. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will make a fine [Root.GetConsortSexCap]!
That vile hag [From.GetBestName] has forced me to become her consort!
[FromFrom.GetBestName] has forced my husband [From.GetBestName] to become her consort!

The [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] for [Root.GetBaseName] against [New.GetTitledName] has come to an end as [New.GetSheHe] has been overthrown. The [From.Religion.GetGroupName] faithful will be disappointed.
The [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] for [Root.GetBaseName]
Praise [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
Cursed infidels!
Cursed Infidels!
Narrowly avoiding capture by the forces of [From.GetTitledFirstName], I am now forced to raise the banner of rebellion.
My liege has seen fit to throw me in the dungeon. My life might be forfeit.
I managed to flee from imprisonment but my escape from 'justice' caused me to become exiled and I cannot return to the country ever again.
I have been released from the dungeons of [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
My neck rests uneasily on the headsman's block as I await eternity. [From.GetTitledFirstName] has seen fit to end my life.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to spare my wretched life and banish me from the realm.
I woke up to loud shouts in the hallway outside my chambers. My guards had slain a would-be assassin, but another one got away.
Three assassins disguised as pages jumped me on my way to my chambers. The guards saved my life, but not before I was stabbed in the side.
The pain is almost too much to bear. [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName] curse the assailant who maimed me and managed to escape!
My trusty cook caught one of the kitchen staff poisoning my wine! Under torture, he admitted that [From.GetTitledFirstName] had paid him.
I woke up to find a shadowy figure climbing in through the window. I yelled for help and the guards burst in, seizing the assassin just as he stabbed me in the shoulder.

My new chambermaid attacked me with a nasty little dagger. She took an eye out before the guards could subdue her. Before her speedy execution, she gave up the name of her employer - [From.GetBestName].
The hooded assassin got me! My vision is fading fast. May my kin avenge me!
I am dying! The veal was laced with poison! Such excruciating pain... but I die knowing who murdered me.

His Holiness, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], has been swayed by the cries for help from the Christian population in the [crusade_title.GetFullName]. He urges all able-bodied men of Europe to take up arms against the evil [crusade_character.GetTitledName] in order to secure [crusade_title.GetName] from the clutches of the Mahommedan infidels.\n\n God will grant the pilgrims remission of sins in Heaven!

His Holiness, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], is worried about the state of the souls in the [crusade_title.GetFullBaseName]. The heathens under [crusade_character.GetTitledName] have no hope for salvation and will suffer the eternal fires unless they can be brought to Christ in this life. Any Christian so willing is offered complete absolution of sins in the armed mission against the [crusade_character.Religion.GetName] barbarians!
I submit to your wise counsel and will convert to the [This.Religion.GetName] faith forthwith.
I refuse to convert to your false religion, the [From.Religion.GetName] faith is the true faith.
I humbly accept your decision to revoke the [Root.GetFullName], though it grieves me deeply.
I will not allow you to steal my titles without a fight! You are no longer my liege lord.
I accept your offer of peace.
I reject your offer of peace.
Please accept this humble gift of §Y[GetDiploGiftSize]§!¤.
They declined our gift!
I accept to swear fealty to you and to serve as your vassal lord.
I reject your offer of vassalization. I do not need your 'protection'.
I have decided to accept your suggestion of a betrothal between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName].
I reject your insulting suggestion. [New.GetTitledFirstName] will never marry [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
I have decided to accept your suggestion that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName] get married. All children of the union will be of her Dynasty.
Regrettably, I feel it would not be in my best interests for [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to marry [New.GetTitledFirstName] under those terms.
I accept your suggestion that [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName] get married.
Regrettably, I feel it would not be in my best interests for [Root.GetTitledFirstName] to marry [New.GetTitledFirstName].
I accept paying your ransom for the safe return of [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
I refuse to pay your extortionate ransom demand for [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
I gladly accept the Guardianship contract between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName].
I fear that I cannot accept accept the Guardianship contract between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName].
Your demand is just. My scheming was obviously misdirected. I hope you will find it in you to forgive me.
I will eventually [From.GetPlot]! You cannot stop me.
I accept your demand. I will no longer back [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s dubious plot to [Root.GetPlot].
I will not withdraw my support for [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s plan to [Root.GetPlot].
An intriguing scheme! I believe I will indeed back your plot to [This.GetPlot].
I refuse to back your foolish plot to [This.GetPlot].
I have decided to grant you the [Root.GetFullName] in recognition of your service and your nobility of spirit.
REMOVED
I would be honored to serve on your Council!
Regrettably, I must decline your gracious offer to serve on your Council.
Your request has merit. In the name of [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName], I grant you the right to invade the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]!
I fear I must refuse your request to invade [Root.GetTitledFirstName]'s lands.
After much prayer and meditation, I have decided to grant your request to divorce your spouse on the grounds of consanguinity.
Matrimony is a holy bond. Under the laws of the Church, I cannot grant you divorce.
The vile excesses of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] can no longer be tolerated! We agree that [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] should be denied communion and be excommunicated!
The vile excesses of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] can no longer be tolerated! We agree that [Root.GetSubjectPronoun] should be excommunicated!
We refuse to excommunicate the gentle and pious [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
Of course I will honor my obligation and answer your call to war!
We can unfortunately not join your wars at this time.
This is a formal declaration of WAR. Our armies shall meet on the field of battle!
You have not fulfilled your obligations as a liege lord, thus leaving me little choice but to declare WAR.
My liege, I accept your decision to retract my vassal, [Root.GetBestName], though it grieves me deeply.
Your breach of the feudal contract is unacceptable, I will not give up my vassals without a fight!
I accept your gracious invitation and will join your court forthwith!
I cannot in good conscience abandon my current liege to join your court.
I accept you as my vassal. Henceforth, you will enjoy my protection as your liege lord.
Your offer is tempting, but I have to decline your offer to become my vassal.
I will gladly lift the excommunication of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and allow [Root.GetObjectPronoun] back into the Church!
I am afraid that the depravity of [Root.GetTitledFirstName] precludes a return to the embrace of Holy Mother Church.
But of course I accept such a generous ransom. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has been released!
I am afraid I cannot accept your offer. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] had better remain in my custody.
I accept your offer of settling down.
I refuse to accept your offer of settling down.
I have decided to institute the [From.GetProposedLaw] Law. All that is needed is the support of yourself and my other loyal vassals.\n\nYour [From.Holder.GetTitle]
I have decided to institute the [From.GetProposedLaw] Law in the [From.GetFullName]. Your status as my de jure vassal entitles you to vote on the matter.\n\n[From.Holder.GetTitledName]

I have decided to institute the [From.GetProposedLaw] Law in the [From.GetFullName]. Since this is a Crown Law and you are a formal elector of [From.GetName], you may vote, even though you are not my vassal... yet.\n\n[From.Holder.GetTitledName]
I gladly accept your offer of assistance in my war. Let our enemies tremble!\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I appreciate your offer, but I do not need your meddling in my war.\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]

After careful consideration, I have decided to accept your suggestion. Together, we shall force the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] traders out of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]!\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
Honestly, I find your embargo suggestion against [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] rather ludicrous. Why should I favor one money-grubbing Republic over another?\n\n[From.GetTitledFirstName]
I have decided to accept your suggestion to make [Root.GetTitledFirstName] into your concubine.
I reject your insulting suggestion. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will never become your concubine.

The great [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to call a Jihad against the Kafirs in the [From.GetFullBaseName]. He urges all righteous [Root.Religion.GetName] Muslims to take up arms against the depraved [New.GetTitledName] for the glory of Islam.\n\n Allah is merciful!

The [crusade_title.GetFullBaseName] is afflicted with the scourge of Heresy. His Holiness, [Root.GetTitledFirstName], has decided that the impure [crusade_character.GetTitledName] and [crusade_character.GetPossPronoun] fallen followers must be Cleansed before this black stain spreads any further!

The [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has decided to declare Jihad on the depraved heathens in the [From.GetFullBaseName]. He urges all righteous [Root.Religion.GetName] Muslims to partake in the righteous struggle against [New.GetTitledName] for the glory of Islam.\n\n Allah is great!

The most righteous [Root.Religion.GetName] [Root.GetTitledFirstName] is deeply concerned with the straying people of the [From.GetFullBaseName], many of whom barely deserve being called Muslims. He urges all true ([Root.Religion.GetName]) Muslims to aid in the struggle against the heretic [New.GetTitledName] for the glory of Islam.\n\n Allah is merciful!

The mighty [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has decided that it is time to teach [New.GetTitledName] and the believers in the dead crucified god another lesson in humility. All free [Root.Religion.GetName] men are invited to partake in the scouring of the [From.GetFullBaseName]!\n\n [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] is with us!

[Root.GetTitledFirstName] has had a vision from [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName], ordering [Root.GetObjectPronoun] to declare a great [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] on [New.GetTitledName] and the cawing followers of the mad Arab. All free [Root.Religion.GetName] men are invited to feast in their holy places!\n\n [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] is mighty!

The omens are clear - [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] on [New.GetTitledName] and the followers of [New.Religion.GetRandomGodName] in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All free [Root.Religion.GetName] men are encouraged to aid in the conquest of their holy places!\n\n [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] will strike down their '[New.Religion.GetRandomGodName]'!

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the adherents of '[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]' in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nThe dark manifestations of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] must be cleansed in healing flames!

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the [New.Religion.GetName] infidels in [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms against the deniers of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nThe Magi will cleanse their churches in healing flames!

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the followers of [New.Religion.GetHighGodName] in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms against the old arch-enemy!\n\nMuhammed was the mouthpiece of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName] and all his works must be destroyed!

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the adherents of '[New.Religion.GetHighGodName]' in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! All righteous [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms in the name of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!\n\nThe idolators will learn to fear the Lord!

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the [New.Religion.GetGroupName] infidels in [From.GetFullBaseName]! All true [Root.Religion.GetName] men are called to arms against the old oppressors!\n\nThe Lord will prove us right!

The great [Root.GetTitledFirstName] has declared a [Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] against [New.GetTitledName] and the followers of [New.Religion.GetHighGodName] in the [From.GetFullBaseName]! The whole [Root.Religion.GetName] nation is called to arms against the [New.Religion.GetName] menace!\n\nThe false works of the Madman must be torn down!
I have decided to accept your suggestion of a matrilineal betrothal between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [New.GetTitledFirstName].
I reject your insulting suggestion. [New.GetTitledFirstName] will never marry [Root.GetTitledFirstName] matrilineally.
[New.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetTitledFirstName] are getting married. We can collect a Royal Aid Duty to pay for the ceremonies.

Like Ahura Mazda and Spandarmad at the time of creation, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetPossPronoun] [GetFromVsNewRelation] [New.GetTitledFirstName] have gotten married under the blessed auspices of Xwedodah, ensuring fullness and Order. We can collect a Royal Aid Duty to pay for the ceremonies.

Like the children of Adam and Eve at the dawn of time, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetPossPronoun] [GetFromVsNewRelation] [New.GetTitledFirstName] have formed a sacred union, pleasing to [From.Religion.GetRandomGodName]. We can collect a Royal Aid Duty to pay for the ceremonies.

In order to ensure the divine purity of their bloodline, [From.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.GetPossPronoun] [GetFromVsNewRelation] [New.GetTitledFirstName] have gotten married under the blessed auspices of [From.Religion.GetHighGodName], ensuring fullness and Order. We can collect a Royal Aid Duty to pay for the ceremonies.
I humbly accept your decision to absorb the [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] Clan, though it grieves me deeply.
I will not allow you to steal my people without a fight! You are no longer my Khan.
I swear to you that we shall be bonded by blood as brothers!
I do not accept your offer of blood oath.
The feud has finally come to an end and our people can again know peace.
The [From.Clan.GetName] are stubborn and refuses to put our issues behind us.
I humbly accept your decision to split my Clan, though it grieves me deeply.
I will not allow you to steal my people without a fight! You are no longer my Khan.
I graciously accept your gift and will remember your good intentions in the future.
You must understand that you cannot simply buy my loyalty like this. I refuse your gift.
I will support you in the council.
I am sorry, but I just cannot support you in the council.
I, [From.GetBestName], accept your proposal for a Non-Aggression Pact!
I, [From.GetBestName], unfortunately have to decline your proposal for a Non-Aggression Pact!
I demand that you grant me a position on your council, in return for the favor you owe me.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] declined [From.GetTitledFirstName] request to join the council as [Title.GetName], despite the favor owed.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] spent the favor [This.GetTitledFirstName] owed [From.GetObjectPronoun] to force the Realm Peace.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] declined [From.GetTitledFirstName] request to force the realm peace, despite the favor owed.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] spent the favor [This.GetTitledFirstName] owed [From.GetObjectPronoun] to force [This.GetTitledFirstName] to join their Factions.
[This.GetTitledFirstName] declined [From.GetTitledFirstName] to join [Actor.GetTitledFirstName]'s factions, despite the favor owed.
I was remiss not to invite you in the first place. You may indeed join my plot to [From.GetPlot].
Why would I want the help of the likes of you with my plot to [From.GetPlot]?
I accept your gracious offer. [Root.GetTitledFirstName] will make a fine [Root.GetConsortSexCap]!
I accept your gracious gift. What a splendid object!
A revolt has broken out in [Root.GetName]! Angered by my 'oppressive' rule, the peasants have taken to arms.

A revolt has broken out in [From.GetName]! Angered by the oppressive rule of [From.County.Holder.GetTitledName], the peasants have taken to arms. Their indiscriminate destruction will unfortunately hit my holdings as well...
Peasant rebels have taken control of one of our holdings in [From.GetName] and looted it!
The peasant rebels in [From.GetName] have been dispersed and our holding taken back!

[From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] has granted [From.GetTitledName] victory in the [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] for [Root.GetBaseName] against [New.GetTitledName]. [From.RelHead.GetTitledName] has called for a month of celebration across the whole [From.Religion.GetGroupName] world!

[From.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap], it seems, does not favor the [From.Religion.GetGroupName] faithful. After a string of defeats and setbacks, [From.GetTitledName] has called off the [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] for [Root.GetBaseName] against [New.GetTitledName].
That vile brute [From.GetBestName] has forced me to become his concubine!
That vile hag [From.GetBestName] has forced me to become her consort!
[FromFrom.GetBestName] has forced my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetBestName] to become his concubine!
[FromFrom.GetBestName] has forced my wife [From.GetBestName] to become his concubine!
[FromFrom.GetBestName] has forced my husband [From.GetBestName] to become her consort!

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] religion is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of the Cross and the Moon. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith. With codified rites, a holy scripture and a strict church hierarchy under a single leader, they hope that the reformed [Root.Religion.GetName] faith is better armed to fight back against the weak and effeminate foreign beliefs!
[Root.GetReformationNature]\n[Root.GetReformationLeadership][Root.GetReformationReligion]\n[Root.GetReformationOutro]

The ancient [Root.Religion.GetName] is proving unable to withstand the onslaught of its organized, proselytizing neighbors. Rather than abandoning the old ways, [Root.GetTitledName] and the most powerful of [Root.GetHerHis] priests have decided to reform the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith in order to turn the tides and protect their ancient customs.\nWith official clergy and ratified scriptures, this new religion has already started to spread amongst the old [Root.Religion.GetName] faithful.
Having refused to give up my title to [From.GetTitledFirstName], I am now forced to raise the banner of rebellion.
Having refused to give up my rightful vassal to [From.GetTitledFirstName], I am now forced to raise the banner of rebellion.
Having refused to have my clan absorbed by [From.GetTitledFirstName], I am now forced to raise the banner of rebellion.
Having refused to have my clan split by [From.GetTitledFirstName], I am now forced to raise the banner of rebellion.
I have been convinced by [From.GetLawProposer] to institute the [From.GetProposedLaw] Law. All that is needed is the support of yourself and my other loyal vassals.\n\nYour [From.Holder.GetTitle]
My guards failed to capture [From.GetTitledFirstName], who has now raised [From.GetPossPronoun] flag in rebellion!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is now safely locked away in my dungeon, awaiting [From.GetPossPronoun] fate...
[From.GetTitledFirstName] managed to avoid my guardsmen and has fled to the court of [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName].
My hired killers failed to slay [From.GetTitledFirstName], but my involvement remains unknown.
My assassins failed to kill [From.GetTitledFirstName]. Even worse, they divulged my name!
Joyous news! [From.GetTitledFirstName] died choking on [From.GetPossPronoun] blood, not knowing the name of [From.GetPossPronoun] killer.
Good news! [From.GetTitledFirstName] died green and bloated like a toad. Unfortunately, the poisoner was apprehended and tortured until he blabbed my name.
My spymaster is planning retribution against [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] for having attempted the assassination of [From.GetTitledFirstName].
[From.GetTitledFirstName] is asking us to deal with an assassination attempt inside our realm.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has judged that our rival now have a legitimate claim on our title.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted us a claim on our rival for their vile assassinations.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] has ordered the arrest of our rival for their vile assassinations.
[From.GetTitledFirstName] refuse to deal with our problems with a rival inside [From.GetHerHis] realm.

Not only did our assassin get discovered, he also managed to implicate that we were behind it.  Now [From.GetBestName] is showing proofs to everyone in the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] that we have broken our feudal contract with a vassal.

On the death of my [GetNewRelation], my [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] may have been elected [From.PrimaryTitle.GetRulerTitle] of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName], but I am under no obligation to accept [From.GetObjectPronoun] as my liege!
My [GetFromRelation] [From.GetFirstName] has chosen independence from my rule.
To Arms!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] preserve me!
To see the sun again!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] curse [From.GetPossPronoun] name!
I'll be back!
Who would want me dead?
Damned murderers!
Vengeance!
[From.GetTitledFirstName] sent him.
I will blind [From.GetFirstName] before [From.GetSubjectPronoun] dies!
[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodNameCap] greet my soul!
A million deaths for [From.GetTitledFirstName]!
Deus Vult!
Approve
Allahu Akbar!
For [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
For God and Israel!
For [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]!
Yes, it is everyone's concern
At last!
They are a simple people...
This could be a problem
Great
Not good
A wise choice.
What is the [GetFromRootInsult] planning?
How dare they oppose me!
If the count doesn't act, I better...
They should all be hanged!
A Black Day!
Oh, cruel fate...
How dare she!
[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] will pay for this!
[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] will pay for this!
For [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]!
To Arms!
Let [From.GetObjectPronoun] cower in fear!
Useless thugs...
At least [From.GetSubjectPronoun] took a wound
On the bright side, they did maim [From.GetHerHim]!
This will not help my reputation
Well, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] did take a wound
At least [From.GetSubjectPronoun] lost an eye!
I must make sure the assassins stay silent...
A small price to pay...
Ask our Liege to settle this.
I will grant [From.GetObjectPronoun] a claim on the perpetrator's titles.
That is just words...
Good News!
Good News!
Is [From.GetSheHe] mad?
This is bad news...
The realm should stay one.
Such is [From.GetPossPronoun] right...
Time to split the realm!
Order the arrest!
Off to the jail.
An eye for an eye...
It's better to forgive and forget.
It is not my call...
Execute [FromFrom.GetHerHim]!
Expose the assassins employer!
Our liege will evaluate our request.
will be exposed as an employer of assassins.
That's no concern of ours...
Ignore
No, people respect wealth!
Pathetic...
I will never rest until [FromFrom.GetSheHe] is brought to justice!
Embrace the Reformation!
Foolish Infidels!
Decline
The heretics falter!
The old ways are still best
To Arms!
They are still barbarians!
What Terrible News!
§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! takes a place on your council.
I, [From.GetBestName], accept your proposal for an Alliance!
I, [From.GetBestName], unfortunately have to decline your proposal for an Alliance!
[Root.Religion.GetCrusadeName] for [GetCrusadeTarget]!
[crusade_title.GetBaseName]
[From.GetBaseName]
Successful [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName]!
The [From.Religion.GetCrusadeName] Fails!
The [Root.Religion.GetName] Reformation
